channel.title: Is my Captcha to hard? Could you guys test
channel.description:
Hey guys, I made a test forum website for my up coming project, in smf.
I made a costum Captcha, that you need to rotate the pictures till they are normal. The Captcha i made got RS pictures like Barrow items, p hats, masks, godswords, scimitars.
Can you guys test it, and give feedback if it is "Moron fool retard" friendly.
The link is www.newhome.lastdivine.com (This is [b][u]Not[/u][/b] advertisment, My real forum will move somewhere else this is just a test setup, the server isnt even online ;)
Hope you guys could try it
[u][b] No Need to activate with e-mail[/b][/u]

item.title: Is my Captcha to hard? Could you guys test
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

So far none Bots registered, i only think its prevents players.

Read full topic

Would probably prevent people from registering on your site.

item.title: Is my Captcha to hard? Could you guys test
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:1, topic:475312”]Hey guys, I made a test forum website for my up coming project, in smf.

I made a costum Captcha, that you need to rotate the pictures till they are normal.
The Captcha i made got RS pictures like Barrow items, p hats, masks, godswords, scimitars.

Can you guys test it, and give feedback if it is “Moron fool retard” friendly.

The link is www.newhome.lastdivine.com (This is Not advertisment, My real forum will move somewhere else this is just a test setup, the server isnt even online

Hope you guys could try it


No Need to activate with e-mail[/quote]
Should set it to say “Match the images below to the ones to the [Direction here]”
Cause I didn’t know what angle that god sword was supposed to be. Facing vertically up or what.

Read full topic
